text: "Strong Enough to Bend" is a 1988 song by country singer Tanya Tucker and is the title track to her 17th studio album Strong Enough to Bend. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 2 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart. ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:Country songs Category:Tanya Tucker songs
title: Strong Enough to Bend (song)
